sentences.en: After a pause he added'sir. " in a dilatory , grudging way.
sentences.cn: 停了一会他才慢吞吞地 、 勉勉强强地加了一声 “ 先生 ”.

sentences.en: Cautious or dilatory, as in taking action.
sentences.cn: 谨慎的、保守的, 如在采取行动中.

sentences.en: Dilatory ways of doing things I do to reduce my efficiency.
sentences.cn: 我拖拖拉拉的做事方法的确降低我的办事效率.

sentences.en: His credIt'suffered because he was dilatory in paying his bills.
sentences.cn: 因为他付账迟误了以至于信用卡出了问题.

sentences.en: I found it was not efficient suddenly, very dilatory.
sentences.cn: 忽然觉得自己很没效率, 办事太拖沓.

sentences.en: The dilatory diplomacy towards Iran must be brought to a focus.
sentences.cn: 伊朗问题方面,应给予缓慢的外交进程以足够的重视.

sentences.en: The dilatory limousine came rolling up the drive.
sentences.cn: 那辆姗姗来迟的大型轿车沿着汽车道开了上来.

sentences.en: The pars transversa provides lateral wall rigidity and can even be a dilatory muscle.
sentences.cn: 鼻肌横部提供外侧壁硬度,甚至做为扩张肌.

sentences.en: You are more dilatory than I ( am ) in answering letters.
You might expect politicians to smooth things out when civil servants are being dilatory.
sentences.cn: 公务员办事拖沓，你可能认为政治家会把事情顺利解决。

words.tran_cn: 拖拉的；缓慢的，不慌不忙的
